promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young mythical crow normal-type wearing a dark crown. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Corvim, a chibi young mythical crow normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: spit-up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word crow or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, crow-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Curious Corvim scours fields, always eager to explore and learn. Its Spit-Up helps keep it safe while taking fun risks.
